Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Express server base path configuration for /ai-dashboard deployment

- Configure all routes with BASE_PATH prefix to support deployment at /ai-dashboard
- Update Swagger UI routes to include base path
- Update API routes (/auth, /api/*) with base path
- Update production server URLs in Swagger specs to include full path
- Simplify redirect logic for root and /api-docs routes

This fixes 404 errors when accessing the app at https://webplatform.enversedstudios.com/ai-dashboard/

Note: BASE_PATH=/ai-dashboard must be added to .env on the server
